definition: relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
industrial relations/relations between labor and capital
to seek contact with sb for one's own benefit/to suck up to sb
favoritism shown to sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative/(by extension) favoritism towards relatives, friends or associates
to transfer (from one unit to another)

sentences.english: The relationship between bond valence and bond covalency has been investigated by a semiempirical method.
sentences.chinese: 方法研究了固体材料中键电荷与键共价性的关系。

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很了解他，那里的人事关系很复杂。

sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分独自一人的时间想必和寂寞扯不上什么关系。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替换性仅限于修改依赖关系以依赖不同的内容。

sentences.english: Education and knowledge has close inner relationship.
sentences.chinese: 教育与知识有着血肉相连的内在关系。

sentences.english: Case of the table with the biggest difference is that dioica and face.
sentences.chinese: 案，案与桌的最大不同，在于腿子和面的关系。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on port-city relation is extremely essential.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究港城关系是十分必要的。

sentences.english: S. joint communiques and the fundamental norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 它违背《中美三个联合公报》和基本的国际关系准则。

sentences.english: May Amma Bhagavan's blessing bring love and joy into your Relationships.
sentences.chinese: 愿阿妈和巴格万的祝福把爱和喜悦带入你的关系之中。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是关于空气污染与静脉血栓关系的数据却很有限。

sentences.english: Well, it’s just that your mom was always bugging you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我想大概是你妈妈以前总在在你耳边唠叨的关系吧。

sentences.english: This fragmentation of relationship is the degenerating factor in our life.
sentences.chinese: 关系的分割是我们生命中的堕落因素。

sentences.english: Lipstick on Her Collar? Men Say, ‘O.K.’
sentences.chinese: 她衣领上有唇印？男士说，“没关系”。

sentences.english: How long have you been waiting to finally have sex with your girlfriend?
sentences.chinese: 你在最终和你女朋友发生性关系前等了有多久？

sentences.english: Blog membership must be managed from the group itself.
sentences.chinese: 博客成员关系必须由群组本身管理。

sentences.english: The merchants realized that it was important to expand the clan influence if they wanted to get wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 商人认识到扩大宗族势力与自身致富有直接的关系。

definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
to associate (with)/to have contact (with)/to hang out (with)/to date/(interpersonal) relationship/association/contact
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
